flank (the side of one's torso); to coerce; to threaten
фланг (сторона туловища); принуждать; угрожать

(Simplified: 胁)
Ideographic: To control 劦 another's body ⺼

脅肩諂笑 [ xié jiān chǎn xiào ]: to act obsequiously (idiom)

heisig_chinese_memo: When your triceps rest alongside your body, they fit snugly against your armpit. When you hold them above your body, however, your posture becomes quite threatening.
heisig_constituent: threaten, triceps, power, muscle, arnold, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, power3, muscle3, arnold3
koohiiStory1: Compare the primitive positions of armpit (#870) and threaten (#871). When your triceps rest alongside your body, they fit snugly against your armpit. When you hold them above your body, however, your posture becomes quite threatening.
koohiiStory2: Don´t threaten a warewolf. He´s three times as powerful ON a full moon.　RTK2:　キョウ　脅迫　きょうはく (blackmail)…　Pure Group:　協872.
kunYomi: おびや.かす、おど.す、おど.かす
jp_example_words:
脅かす(おどかす): to threaten, to coerce
脅す(おどす): to threaten, to menace
脅迫(きょうはく): threat, menace, coercion, terrorism
jp_readingExamples: 脅かす (おど.かす), 脅す (おど.す), 脅かす (おびや.かす)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's power, power, and power stacked on top of the moon, threatening to bring it down!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The moon actually looks like it wants to threaten you now too. It seems to have grown a big, smiling, angry mouth and it's way closer to you than you've ever seen it. All that power is radiating out of it and down towards you, threateningly.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This extra power-filled moon is now trying to threaten the safety of きょうと. All of きょうと is shaking and getting dark as the moon comes closer and closer.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the powerful moon, threatening to crush きょうと and all its residents. If only a small green boy could turn back time and save everyone from this powerful moon!
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 劦 (キョウ много силы, сотрудничество), сам по себе не используется.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: for a month (月) you make 3x the effort (劦) to threaten
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: It's a natural reaction for your body to sweat when things threaten you.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " flesh " to "劦" sound, the original meaning is the part from the armpit to the waist on both sides of the body, also refers to the ribs. "Shuowen": "Two arms. From the flesh, the sound." "Zuo Gong-Twenty-Three Years of Xi Gong": "Cao Gonggong heard of his threats, and wanted to see his nakedness." Kong Yingda Shu: "The threats are under the arms Its name is the rib."

" Waist " can mean the side. The Northern Wei Dynasty Li Daoyuan's "Shuijing Note-Weishui I": "The stone is three feet long, wide and thick, waiting for a little bit, with the cliff side, going to the place for more than a hundred meters, the folk name is Shigu."

" Threat " also means persecution and intimidation. "Book ‧ Thai Oath": "When friends make enemies, threaten power and destroy."
humanum_short_description_en: From " meat " to "劦", the original meaning is the part from the armpit to the waist on both sides of the body, also refers to the ribs.
humanum_full_description:
從「肉」，「劦」聲，本義為身軀兩側自腋下至腰上的部分，亦指肋骨。《說文》：「兩膀也。从肉，劦聲。」《左傳‧僖公二十三年》：「曹共公聞其駢脅，欲觀其裸。」孔穎達疏：「脅是腋下之名，其骨謂之肋。」

　　「脅」可表示旁邊。北魏酈道元《水經注‧渭水一》：「石長丈三尺，廣厚略等，著崖脅，去地百餘丈，民俗名曰石鼓。」

　　「脅」也表示逼迫、威嚇。《書‧泰誓中》：「朋家作仇，脅權相滅。」
humanum_short_description: 從「肉」，「劦」聲，本義為身軀兩側自腋下至腰上的部分，亦指肋骨。

①從腋下到肋骨盡處的部分：脅下。
②逼迫恐嚇：脅迫。威脅。裹脅。脅持。脅從。

脅かす(おどかす): to threaten, to coerce
脅す(おどす): to threaten, to menace
脅迫(きょうはく): threat, menace, coercion, terrorism

從「 肉 」，「 劦 」聲，本義為身軀兩側自腋下至腰上的部分，亦指肋骨。《說文》：「兩膀也。从肉，劦聲。」《左傳‧僖公二十三年》：「曹共公聞其駢脅，欲觀其裸。」孔穎達疏：「脅是腋下之名，其骨謂之肋。」 「 脅 」可表示旁邊。北魏酈道元《水經注‧渭水一》：「石長丈三尺，廣厚略等，著崖脅，去地百餘丈，民俗名曰石鼓。」 「 脅 」也表示逼迫、威嚇。《書‧泰誓中》：「朋家作仇，脅權相滅。」
From " flesh" to " 劦" sound, the original meaning is the part from the armpit to the waist on both sides of the body, also refers to the ribs. "Shuowen": "Two arms. From the flesh, the sound." "Zuo Gong-Twenty-Three Years of Xi Gong": "Cao Gonggong heard of his threats, and wanted to see his nakedness." Kong Yingda Shu: "The threats are under the arms Its name is the rib." " Waist" can mean the side. The Northern Wei Dynasty Li Daoyuan's "Shuijing Note-Weishui I": "The stone is three feet long, wide and thick, waiting for a little bit, with the cliff side, going to the place for more than a hundred meters, the folk name is Shigu." " Threat" also means persecution and intimidation. "Book ‧ Thai Oath": "When friends make enemies, threaten power and destroy."

xié, xiàn, xī
вм. 胁
Radicals: 力, 月  (power, moon)
Meaning Mnemonic
There's power, power, and power stacked on top of the moon, threatening to bring it down!
The moon actually looks like it wants to threaten you now too. It seems to have grown a big, smiling, angry mouth and it's way closer to you than you've ever seen it. All that power is radiating out of it and down towards you, threateningly.
Reading Mnemonic
This extra power-filled moon is now trying to threaten the safety of きょうと. All of きょうと is shaking and getting dark as the moon comes closer and closer.
Picture the powerful moon, threatening to crush きょうと and all its residents. If only a small green boy could turn back time and save everyone from this powerful moon!
